name: The Hospital of Fear
description:
"The Hospital of Fear" - psychological indie horror from the first person, in the genre of walking simulator. The main focus is on the atmosphere of horror, which is emphasized by realistic 3D graphics and immersive 3D sounds, as well as a well-developed storyline with two different endings.

Average time to complete the game: 2 hours

Description

Alex Brown is the main character who is tormented by the same nightmare every night. For several years, he sees some kind of abandoned mental hospital, in which something kills him every time he falls asleep. But at one point the dream did not end with his death, and he takes it as a sign. He decides to go to this mental hospital to get rid of his nightmare once and for all!



The main character will need to get into an abandoned mental hospital, in which something terrible has obviously happened, because there are only corpses around. He will have to figure out what happened here, diving into the diary of the head doctor of this hospital and seeing his memories, simultaneously solving puzzles to advance in history.

Having made his way to the hospital, he realizes that someone is watching him... or something?... and even tries to tell him something. Horror envelops Alex, but it will not be possible to escape...

Briefly


◇ Try to get to the hospital unnoticed, bypassing the security post

◇ Explore the mental hospital and figure out what happened here. But don't forget that someone is nearby..

◇ Immerse yourself in the history of notes left by the head doctor of this hospital

◇ As you move through history, listen to your heart and choose those variants of events that are closer to you
